Package edu.uw.pce.advjava.support.exchange

package edu.uw.pce.advjava.support.exchange
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractExchange
    A simple exchange implementation for test purposes.
    ExchangeEvent
    Encapsulates the exchange event state.
    ExchangeEvent.EventType
    The exchange event types.
    ExchangeListener
    Interface for exchange listeners.
    FauxMarket
    Factory for creating a StockExchange for test purposes.
    MarketException
    General Exception type for exchange errors.
    StockExchange
    An interface for stock exchanges.
    StockExchangeSpi
    An interface for stock exchanges that provides operations for controlling the stock exchange.
    StockQuote
    Represents a stock quote: a ticker symbol, a price associated with that stock and the time it was issued.
    TestExchange
    A simple exchange implementation for test purposes.
